title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Capacity Building to Ministry of Finance - Strengthening Government Social Protection Systems for the Poor (SGSP) Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance for Capacity Building to Ministry of Finance - Strengthening Government Social Protection Systems for the Poor (SGSP) Programme) is a component of Strengthening Government Social Protection Systems for the Poor (SGSP) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £9,190,328. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Public finance management (PFM), Social Protection, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe, IMC Worldwide, Maxwell Stamp PLC. The start date is 01-08-2012 and the end date is 30-06-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
Executive - General Public Service - Executive - executive
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - policy, planning and administration
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2019 Quarter 2
